reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 67/04: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2004 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — TIME LIMITS FOR 2004 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 67/04: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2004 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to time limits under sections 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 and 362 of the Act for 2004. O. Reg. 67/04, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to time limits under sections 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 and 362 of the Act for 2004. O. Reg. 67/04, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The time limits under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to July 30, 2004. O. Reg. 67/04, s. 2; O. Reg. 157/04, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. The time limits under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to July 30, 2004. O. Reg. 67/04, s. 2; O. Reg. 157/04, s. 1.
